entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
